item.title: Added Azure Free web app daily limit

item.title: Added link in the top section
Added Resources for Game Development
item.description:
https://itch.io/game-assets - Free/Paid assets like sprites, tile sets, character packs, ...
https://gamedevmarket.net - Free/Paid assets like 2D, 3D, Audio, GUI.
https://opengameart.org - OpenSource Game Assets like music, sounds, sprites, gifs, ...
https://craftpix.net - Free/Paid assets like 2D, 3D, Audio, GUI, backgrounds, icons, tile sets, game kits.
https://lospec.com/ - Online tools for creating pixel art and other restrictive digital art, lots of tutorials/pallet list available to choose for you games
https://www.artstation.com/ - MarketPlace for Free/Paid 2D, 3D assets & audios, icons, tile sets, game kits,..., Also, It can be used for showcasing your art portfolio.
https://rive.app/community/ - Community assets as well as create your own game assets using its free plan.

item.title: added flutter flow
item.description:
#flutter-related-and-building-ios-apps-without-mac - and Building IOS Apps without Mac](#flutter-related-and-building-ios-apps-without-mac)
https://flutlab.io/) - FlutLab is a modern Flutter online IDE and the best place to create, debug, and build cross-platform projects. Build iOS (Without Mac - FlutLab is a modern Flutter online IDE and the best place to create, debug, and build cross-platform projects. Build iOS (Without Mac) and Android apps with Flutter.
https://codemagic.io/ - Codemagic is a fully hosted and managed CI/CD for mobile apps. You can build, test, deploy with a GUI based CI/CD tool. Free tier offers 500 free minutes/month, and Mac Mini instance with 2.3Ghz and 8gb of RAM.
https://flutterflow.io/ - FlutterFlow is a browser-based drag-and-drop interface to build mobile app using flutter.
#table-of-contents - top](#table-of-contents)**
